scraped_articles.title: Selfish Parents Quotes to Help You Cope with This Situation
scraped_articles.meta_description: Through selfish parents quotes, we can explore the impact of selfish parenting.
scraped_articles.content:
Selfish Parents Quotes to Help You Cope with This Situation

Through selfish parents quotes, we can explore the impact of selfish parenting.

Selfish Parents Quotes to Help You Cope with This Situation

Sometimes, parents might not always put their kids first.

They might act in ways that only benefit themselves, leaving their child feeling hurt or neglected.

They might act in ways that only benefit themselves, leaving their child feeling hurt or neglected.

This behavior can leave a lasting impact on the children. It shapes how they see themselves and the world around them.

Through selfish parents quotes, we can explore the impact of selfish parenting.

Whether you've experienced this yourself or know someone who has, these selfish parents quotes might help you cope with this situation.

  • “Being a selfish parent is the biggest crime you can do to your child.”

  • “Narcissist parents don’t care about their children’s feelings at all. Only their feelings matter.” – Kim Saeed

  • “Parents wonder why the streams are bitter when they themselves have poisoned the fountain.” – John Locke

  • “Parents forgive their children least readily for the faults they themselves instilled in them.” – Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

  • "You must let go of the responsibility for the painful events of your childhood and put it where it belongs.” – Susan Forward

  •  “Dysfunctional parents let their children know how burdened they have been by their children and how many sacrifices they had to make in order to raise them.” – Dr Marita Sirota

  • “If your parents ignored you, or if they are just not emotionally available, or if they yell a lot, that is a type of trauma.” – Tucker Max

  • “Did you have parents or just some people who thought they should own somebody?” – Catherine Lacey

  •  “If mental abuse was a punishable crime, a lot of parents would be in jail serving a long term.” – Maddy Malhotra

  • “Most children would rather preserve the fantasy of a loving connection with their fathers and mothers, at all costs, even if it costs them their self-esteem.” – Keith Ablow

  • “Family is supposed to be our safe haven. Very often, it is the place where we find the deepest heartache.” – Iyanla Vanzant

  • “To all you parents out there, don’t make your little girls, or little boys, so thirsty for love that they will want to drink water that will poison them.” – Lisa Bedrick

  • “No, we don’t control who our parents are. We don’t control what color we are. We don’t control what home we are born into. But we control our attitude. We control our work ethic. We control our drive and our commitment.” – Dabo Swinney

  • “Anyone could father a child. But a good parent puts his child’s needs before his own. A parent should be selfless, not selfish.” – Penelope Ward

  • “Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.” – Unknown
  • “Just remember when you are ignoring your child, you are teaching them to live without you.”

  • “Some scars don’t hurt. Some scars are numb. Some scars rid you of the capacity to feel anything ever again.” – Joyce Rachelle

  • “All of us develop our expectations about how people will treat us based on our relationships with our parents.” – Susan Forward

  • “It is a violation of trust to use your kids as caulking for the cracks in you.” – Anne Lamott

  • “Family is where you're meant to be most free. Don't let blood chain you down.”
  • “A dysfunctional family is not a family at all, it's a toxic relationship parading as a requirement.” – Unknown

  • “An unpredictable parent is a fearsome god in the eyes of a child.” – Susan Forward

  • “They are not sorry for harming you. So, don’t feel guilty for cutting them off.” – John Mark Green

  • “Families are homes built on a foundation of trust and love. A toxic family can never be a home, because the foundation doesn't exist.” – Unknown

  • “There’s nothing worse than a man that can be everything to everybody else. Except a father to their own child.” – Unknown

  • “It has been my observation that parents kill more dreams than anybody.” – Spike Lee

  •  “Fighting became a way of life and seemed perfectly normal for your family.” – Steven Farmer

  • “You shouldn’t do that. Not to your child. You should carry your own burdens.” Cassandra Clare

  • “Eventually, all things merge into one, and a river runs through it.” —Norman Maclean

  • “Parent-child relationships aren't created at birth, they're created in life.”

  • “You may feel guilty for leaving your family behind, but you'll never regret moving yourself forward.”

  • “There is no use in walking five miles to fish when you can depend on being just as unsuccessful near home.” —Mark Twain

  • “Parents are the least likely to forgive their children for the flaws they ingrained in them.”

  • “Being a parent shouldn't be when it is convenient for you. It is a 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year commitment.”

scraped_articles.title: 55 Deer Jokes That Will Make You Laugh
scraped_articles.meta_description: Do you need some laugh? These funny deer jokes will surely brighten up your day.
scraped_articles.content:
55 Deer Jokes That Will Make You Laugh

Do you want to laugh and have a good time with friends and family? Everyone needs some fun moments in their busy life. Good jokes can make any day better and bring people together. Deer jokes are perfect for sharing smiles and creating happy memories with the people you care about.

Deer are cute and beautiful animals that live in forests and fields around the world. They have big brown eyes, soft brown fur, and long thin legs. Deer move in graceful ways and can jump very high. Watching deer run and play can make people feel calm and happy. These lovely animals often visit gardens and parks near homes. Their gentle nature and playful actions inspire many deer jokes because they do funny things that make us smile every day.

If you love this lovely animal and need some good laughs, you have come to the right place. In this article, we will share some funny deer jokes that will brighten your day. We gathered these jokes from various sources, Monday (23/6/2025).

The Best Deer Jokes

1. What do you call an eyeless deer? No-eye-deer.

2. Why did the deer start a band? It had the best horns in the forest!

3. What's a deer's favourite game? Buckaroo!

4. How do you let a deer know you like her? You fawn over her.

5. What do deer read? Stag-azines!

6. Why did the deer get braces? He had buck teeth.

7. What do you call a deer that loves to dance? A hoofing star!

8. How do you see a deer behind you? With hind-sight!

9. What kind of deer make great weather forecasters? Rain-deer.

10. What do you call a deer doctor? A hart surgeon!

11. Where did the deer go to fix its tail? The re-tail shop.

12. How do deer stay fit? They go to the gym for some antler-obics!

13. What do you call a deer with his hooves in his ears? Anything you like, he can't hear you!

14. What's a buck's least favorite sandwich bread? Sour doe.

15. Why was the deer so good at math? It could count its points!

16. What is a deer's favourite cake? Doe-nuts!

17. What should you give a deer when it gets stomachache? Elk-a-seltzer.

18. How do deer send secret messages? With invisible ink!

19. What currency do deer use? Bucks!

20. What did the deer say when he left the barbershop? "I feel like a million bucks!"

21. What do you call a deer with perfect vision? A good-eyed deer!

22. Why did the deer blush at the party? It overheard some fawn-cy talk!

23. How does a deer clean his feet? Hoof paste!

24. What game do fawns like playing at sleepovers? Truth-or-deer.

25. Did you hear about the nice deer? She had a hart of gold!

26. What's a deer's favorite place to get ice cream? Deery Queen.

27. Where do deer get all of their coffee? Star-bucks!

28. Who puts money under a deer's pillow? The hoof fairy!

Funny One-Liners Deer Jokes

29. A deer walked into a bar and said, I'm here for the bucks!

30. Deer to be different!

31. My deer friend's so slow, he got lapped by a snail!

32. For real, doe.

33. That deer's so clumsy, it trips over its own antlers!

34. I love you deer-ly!

35. Why's the deer always broke? It keeps blowing its dough!

36. This is so much fawn!

37. I told a deer a secret, but it fawned it off!

38. How deer you!

39. That deer's a singer—she's got all the bucks swooning!

40. Hang on for deer life!

41. The deer tried stand-up comedy but kept buck-ling under pressure!

42. Good i-deer!

43. That deer's so cool, it's practically a buck-star!

44. It's the fawn of a new day!

45. That deer's so sneaky, it could rob a bank and leave hoofprints everywhere!

46. What does a deer say when he's disappointed? Oh deer oh deer!

47. I saw a deer reading a book—it was Bambi's autobiography!

48. That deer's so chill, it naps through hunting season!

49. What do you call a deer with no eyes and no legs? STILL no eyed-deer!

Knock Knock Deer Jokes

50. Knock knock. Who's there? Fawn. Fawn-cy meeting you like this!

51. Knock knock. Who's there? Deer. Deer you glad I'm here?

52. Knock knock. Who's there? Hoof. Hoof's got the best jokes in town?

53. Knock knock. Who's there? Buck. Buck up, it's time to laugh!

54. Knock knock. Who's there? Venison. Venison you gonna laugh at this?

55. Knock knock. Who's there? Doe. Doe-n't let me stand out here!

56. Knock knock. Who's there? Stag. Stag-gering to see me, right?

57. Knock knock. Who's there? Antler. Antler you ready for some fun?

58. Knock knock. Who's there? Bambi. Bambi-lieve I'm here to party!

59. Knock knock. Who's there? Graze. Graze you gonna let me in or what?

60. What did the deer say after she did her friend a favor? "You doe me!"

scraped_articles.title: Mudslide Recipe With 4 Fresh Variants to Fulfil Your Desire and Happiness
scraped_articles.meta_description: This cocktail promises to boost your cocktail game. Each variant offers a unique combination of flavors and aromas.
scraped_articles.content:
Mudslide Recipe With 4 Fresh Variants to Fulfil Your Desire and Happiness

Mudslide Recipe With 4 Fresh Variants to Fulfil Your Desire and Happiness

The classic Mudslide cocktail has long been a beloved luxury.

Mudslide is known for its rich blend of flavors that delight the taste buds. But why not take this iconic treat to new heights? This article presents three fresh and tantalizing variants of the Mudslide cocktail that will awaken your senses. These variants of the Mudslide recipe will redefine your cocktail experience. Get ready to take a journey of flavor and experience as we discover these innovative twists on the classic Mudslide recipe.

istockphoto

Tips on Making Mudslides

With these tips, you're well-equipped to craft a Mudslide cocktail. This will be visually pretty and tantalizing to the taste buds. This Mudslide promises a delightful journey of flavors and enjoyment. Making a Mudslide cocktail is lovely, with a harmonious blend of ingredients to create a rich treat. Here are some tips to ensure your Mudslide is perfectly balanced and satisfying:

• Quality Ingredients Matter: Mudslide is a layered cocktail with multiple components. So, using quality ingredients is crucial. Opt for premium brands of vodka, coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, and chocolate syrup for the best flavor experience.

• Balancing the Flavors: The key to a delicious Mudslide is fulfilling a balanced harmony of flavors. The coffee liqueur provides the coffee kick, the Irish cream liqueur adds creaminess, and the vodka contributes a touch of spirit. Experiment with the ratios of each ingredient to suit your personal taste choices.

• Use Fresh Ingredients: If you add garnishes like whipped cream, chocolate shavings, or crushed nuts, use fresh ingredients for the best presentation. Fresh whipped cream and high-quality chocolate shavings can upgrade your cocktail's visual and taste appeal.

Tips

• Chilling and Mixing: Most Mudslide recipes involve shaking the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice to chill and combine them. Shaking also creates a bubbly texture. Make sure your shaker and the ingredients are totally chilled before mixing.

• Ice Cream Consistency: If you're making a frozen Mudslide, pay attention to the consistency of your ice cream. Slightly softened ice cream blends more quickly and results in a smoother texture. You can also modify the amount of ice cream to fulfill the desired thickness.

• Layering Technique: If you're making a classic Mudslide with layers, pour the ingredients over the back of a spoon to create different layers. Start with coffee liqueur, followed by Irish cream liqueur, and finish with vodka. The spoon helps slow down the pour and prevents the layers from mixing too fast.

• Garnish Creatively: Garnishes will enrich the presentation. This also adds extra flavor and texture. Experiment with different garnishes such as whipped cream, chocolate shavings, crushed nuts, or even a drizzle of chocolate syrup.

• Experiment with Variations: While the classic Mudslide is a favorite, don't be afraid to get creative and try out different variations.

• Enjoy Responsibly: Remember that Mudslides contain alcohol. Enjoy them responsibly, and be mindful of your alcohol intake.

Ingredients:

• 1 1/2 oz vodka

• 1 oz Irish cream liqueur

• 1 oz coffee liqueur

• 1 oz chocolate liqueur

• 1 oz heavy cream

• Fresh mint leaves for garnish

• Chocolate shavings for garnish

Minty Chocolate Mudslide Recipe

Instructions:

1. Fill a shaker with ice and add vodka, coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, chocolate liqueur, and heavy cream.

2. Shake well until the mixture is chilled and well combined.

3. Strain the mixture into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes.

4. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and a sprinkle of chocolate shavings.

5. Serve and enjoy the harmonious blend of mint, chocolate, and cream in this delightful Minty Chocolate Mudslide.

Ingredients:

• 1 1/2 oz coconut rum

• 1 oz coffee liqueur

• 1 oz Irish cream liqueur

• 1 oz chocolate syrup

• 2 oz coconut milk

• Crushed pineapple for garnish

• Shredded coconut for garnish

Tropical Coconut Mudslide Recipe

Instructions:

1. In a shaker, combine coconut rum, coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, chocolate syrup, and coconut milk.

2. Add ice to the shaker and shake vigorously until the ingredients are well mixed and chilled.

3. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice cubes.

4. Garnish with crushed pineapple and a sprinkle of shredded coconut.

5. Sip and savor the tropical paradise of flavors in the delectable Tropical Coconut Mudslide.

Ingredients:

• 1 1/2 oz hazelnut liqueur

• 1 oz coffee liqueur

• 1 oz Irish cream liqueur

• 1 oz vodka

• 1 oz espresso or strong coffee, chilled

• Whipped cream for garnish

• Crushed hazelnuts for garnish

Hazelnut Espresso Mudslide Recipe

Instructions:

1. Combine hazelnut liqueur, coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, vodka, and chilled espresso in a shaker with ice.

2. Shake vigorously until well-mixed and chilled.

3. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice cubes.

4. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of crushed hazelnuts.

5. Delight in the harmonious marriage of rich hazelnut and robust espresso flavors in the Hazelnut Espresso Mudslide.

Ingredients:

• 1 1/2 oz vodka

• 1 oz coffee liqueur

• 1 oz Irish cream liqueur

• 1 oz chocolate syrup

• 1 cup vanilla ice cream

• Whipped cream for topping

• Chocolate shavings for garnish

Frozen Mudslide Recipe

Instructions:

1. In a blender, combine vodka, coffee liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, chocolate syrup, and vanilla ice cream.

2. Blend on high speed until the mixture is smooth and creamy and all the ingredients are well incorporated.

3. Pour the frozen Mudslide mixture into a chilled glass.

4. Top with a generous swirl of whipped cream.

5. Sprinkle chocolate shavings over the whipped cream for an extra touch of indulgence.

6. Insert a straw and sip your way to frozen perfection.

Frozen Mudslide Recipe

There you have it—three delightful variants of the classic Mudslide recipe.

This cocktail promises to boost your cocktail game. Each variant offers a unique combination of flavors and aromas that will leave you wanting more. So, pick your ingredients, shake up these tantalizing mixtures, and enjoy every sip of these cocktails. Cheers to fulfillment and creativity!

scraped_articles.title: Besides Eden Hazard, Here Are 5 Famous Footballers Who Retired Early
scraped_articles.meta_description: Eden Hazard is not the only player to retire early from football.
scraped_articles.content:
Besides Eden Hazard, Here Are 5 Famous Footballers Who Retired Early

Besides Eden Hazard, Here Are 5 Famous Footballers Who Retired Early

Recently, Eden Hazard became a hot topic among football fans because of his decision to retire early. 

The former Chelsea and Real Madrid player decided to retire at the age of just 32 years.

This is a surprise because that age is still a productive period for footballer. 

However, Eden Hazard is not the only player to retire early from football.

Eric Cantona, the charismatic French footballer, retired from professional football at the relatively early age of 30. His retirement was primarily influenced by a combination of personal factors and a loss of passion for the game.  Following his retirement, Cantona transitioned to a career in acting and became a prominent figure in the entertainment industry. 

Eric Cantona

Marco van Basten, the Dutch football legend, retired early in his career at the age of 30 due to persistent and debilitating injury issues. He had been suffering from a series of ankle and knee injuries that severely hampered his ability to perform at the highest level.

Marco van Basten

Jack Wilshere, the English midfielder, retired from professional football in his early 30s due to a combination of injuries and a decline in form. Throughout his career, Wilshere was plagued by recurring injuries that limited his playing time and effectiveness on the field.

Jack Wilshere

Sergio Agüero, the prolific Argentine striker, retired early from professional football at the age of 33 due to persistent physical issues, particularly concerning his knee and hamstring. These injuries had a significant impact on his playing time and performance. Agüero expressed a desire to avoid further damage to his body and ensure a good quality of life after retirement, which played a pivotal role in his decision. 

Sergio Agüero

Gareth Bale, the Welsh football superstar, retired from professional football in his early 30s. His early retirement was influenced by several factors, including persistent injury problems and a strong commitment to represent his national team, Wales. Injuries had plagued his later years, making it challenging for him to maintain peak performance for both his club and country. 

Gareth Bale

scraped_articles.content:
69 Questions To Ask Your Best Friend To Get To Know Them Better

69 Questions To Ask Your Best Friend To Get To Know Them Better

As we go through life, our best friends are there to laugh, cry, and support us through thick and thin.

But how well do we know our best friends? Sometimes, it can be easy to get caught up in the day-to-day routine and forget to ask those deeper questions. The "questions to ask your best friend" help us understand our closest companions. So, if you're looking to strengthen your bond or want to get to know them better, here are 69 questions to ask:

Questions To Ask Your Best Friend

1. What is your happiest memory from our friendship?

2. What is your biggest fear?

3. What is the one thing you can't live without?

4. If you could travel anywhere in the world, where would you go?

5. What is your favorite childhood memory?

6. What is your biggest dream or goal in life?

7. Who has been the most influential person in your life and why?

8. What is a quality you admire most in a friend?

9. If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why?

10. What is something you've always wanted to try but haven't had the chance to yet?

11. What is your favorite book, movie, or TV show and why?

Questions To Ask Your Best Friend

12. If you could meet any historical figure, who would it be and what would you ask them?

13. What is a moment in your life that has shaped who you are today?

14. How do you define success and what does it look like to you?

15. What are some of your pet peeves ?

16. What is your favorite way to relax and unwind?

17. What are some of your biggest goals for the future?

18. How do you handle stress or difficult situations?

Questions To Ask Your Best Friend

19. What is something that always makes you smile no matter what?

20. How would you describe yourself in three words?

21. What is a talent or skill you wish you had?

22. If you could have dinner with any fictional character, who would it be and why?

23. What is a lesson you have learned recently that has had a big impact on you?

24. What is something that always cheers you up when you're feeling down?

25. What is your favorite way to spend a day off?

26. If you could go back in time and change one thing, what would it be ?

27. What is your biggest accomplishment so far?

28. How do you see our friendship evolving in the future?

29. What is a quality you value most in yourself?

30. What is your biggest regret in life?

31. What is something that never fails to make you laugh?

Questions To Ask Your Best Friend

32. What is a goal or dream that you have yet to achieve but are working towards?

33. What is a hobby or interest that you are passionate about?

34. If you could switch lives with someone for a day, who would it be and why?

35. What is a song that always brings back memories for you?

36. What is something that always motivates you to keep going when things get tough?

37. What is a random fact about yourself that not many people know ?

38. What is something you wish more people knew about you?

39. If you could have any job in the world, what would it be?

40. What is a goal that you have achieved that you are most proud of?

41. What is your favorite way to show someone you care about them?

42. What is a lesson you have learned from a difficult experience in your life?

43. What is a place you have always wanted to visit but haven't had the chance to yet?

44. What is a tradition or ritual that holds special meaning for you?

45. If you could only eat one food for the rest of your life, what would it be?

Questions To Ask Your Best Friend

46. What is a fear you have overcome and how did you do it?

47. What is something that always brings you peace or comfort?

48. What is a goal or dream that you have for our friendship?

49. If you could relive one day from your past, which day would it be and why?

50. What is a quality in yourself that you are working to improve?

51. What is a lesson you have learned from a mistake or failure?

52. What is something that always makes you feel grateful for in your life?

53. What is a tradition or ritual that you and your best friend share together?

54. If you could travel anywhere in the world with your best friend, where would you go and why?

55. What is a childhood memory that you and your best friend have together?

56. How do you see your friendship with your best friend impacting your future?

57 . What is a goal or dream that you and your best friend have together?

58. What is a quality in your best friend that you admire the most?

59. If you could give your best friend one piece of advice, what would it be?

60. What is something that always brings joy to your friendship with your best friend?

61. How do you and your best friend support each other

62. What is a favorite inside joke or funny memory you share with your best friend?

63. How do you and your best friend navigate disagreements or conflicts within your friendship?

Questions To Ask Your Best Friend

64. What is a meaningful gift or gesture your best friend has given you?

65. How do you and your best friend celebrate each other's successes?

66. What is a shared goal or adventure you and your best friend have always wanted to experience together?

67. What is a secret or personal struggle that you have shared with your best friend?

68. How do you and your best friend keep the spark alive in your friendship?

69. What is something you appreciate most about having your best friend in your life?

Asking these questions can help deepen your bond with your best friend. It will create meaningful conversations that strengthen your friendship. It's essential to take the time to get to know each other on a deeper level and continue to grow together. So, let's grab a coffee or a walk with your best friend and ask some of these questions. You never know what you might learn about and how it could bring you even closer. Enjoy the journey of discovery and cherish the bond you share with your best friend. So, take the time to connect, communicate, and continue to build a friendship that will last a lifetime.

10 Hottest Women of Fast & Furious Series

10 Hottest Women of Fast & Furious Series

The Fast & Furious series is known for its high-octane action, fast cars, and, of course, the beautiful and talented women who have graced the screen throughout the franchise.

Here is a list of some of the hottest women who have ever appeared in the Fast & Furious series:

1. Michelle Rodriguez 

Michelle plays the tough and fearless Letty Ortiz, the love interest of Dominic Toretto. Letty is known for her skills behind the wheel and her loyalty to her friends and family.

2. Nathalie Kelley 

Nathalie portrayed Neela in "The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift." Neela is a skilled drift racer caught in a love triangle between two rival racers, sean and DK.

3. Gal Gadot 

Before she became Wonder Woman, Gal Gadot appeared in the Fast & Furious series as Gisele Yashar. Gisele is a former Mossad agent turned street racer who becomes a valuable member of Dominic Toretto's team.

4. Jordana Brewster 

Jordana plays Mia Toretto, the sister of Dominic Toretto, and a key member of the Toretto family. Mia is a strong and caring character who is always willing to do whatever it takes to protect her loved ones.

5. Eva Mendes 

Eva portrayed Monica Fuentes in "2 Fast 2 Furious." Monica is an undercover U.S. Customs agent tasked with infiltrating a drug lord's operation.

6. Gina Carano 

Gina played Riley Hicks in "Fast & Furious 6." Riley is a Diplomatic Security Service agent who teams up with Hobbs to take down a dangerous terrorist.

7. Ronda Rousey 

Ronda appeared as Kara in "Furious 7." Kara is a bodyguard hired to protect a powerful billionaire but finds herself in the middle of the action when Dominic Toretto and his crew get involved.

8. Devon Aoki

Devon portrayed Suki in "2 Fast 2 Furious." Suki is a skilled street racer known for her flashy and colorful cars.

9. Charlize Theron

Charlize joined the Fast & Furious family as Cipher in "The Fate of the Furious." Cipher is a cybercriminal mastermind who manipulates Dom into betraying his team.

10. Nathalie Emmanuel 

Nathalie plays Ramsey, a brilliant hacker who joins forces with the crew in "Furious 7." Ramsey's skills with technology are instrumental in helping the team accomplish their missions.

scraped_articles.title: Japanese Man Hasn't Spoken In 20 Years Since His Wife Upset Him
scraped_articles.meta_description: Without speaking, Okou Katayama and his wife live together and raise their three children.
scraped_articles.content:
Japanese Man Hasn't Spoken In 20 Years Since His Wife Upset Him

Without speaking, Okou Katayama and his wife live together and raise their three children.

Japanese Man Hasn't Spoken In 20 Years Since His Wife Upset Him

A married couple in Japan has gone viral. Despite living together, the husband has not spoken to his wife in 20 years.

Okou Katayama and his wife live together and raise their three children.

But, Okou Katayama did not speak to his wife, Yumi. His response only with nods and grunts for two decades.

Their 18-year-old son, Yoshiki, brought up this unusual situation on a Japanese TV show.

He said he had never seen his parents talk to each other, according to Oddity Central.

Yoshiki wrote a letter to Hokkaido Television.

He talked about his parents' awkward relationship. He was afraid they would divorce. 

Although he and his siblings felt something was wrong, they did not know why his father did that.

TV show producers are also curious about this unique story. Hokkaido TV has a plan for Okou Katayama and Yumi.

They make the couple meet at a public park in Nara City. Their children watch from a distance.

Surprisingly, after 20 years of silence, Okou started the conversation. He tells Yumi,

"I don't know why, it's been a long time since we talked."

This emotional moment brought their children to tears.

Okou then revealed why he had remained silent for so long.

"I feel jealous and annoyed that you are so focused on the kids. I don't think there is any turning back now," he said.

"Yumi, you faced a lot of hardships up until now. I want you to know I'm grateful for everything."

He apologizes for not speaking to Yumi in all these years. 

Research has shown that it is common for men to feel jealous when they have children. They think they are no longer the main focus of their partner.

However, this usually leads to fights or affairs. That's why Okou's behavior is rare and unique.

scraped_articles.title: Doctor in Taiwan Removes Over 300 Kidney Stones From Woman Who Always Drinks Bubble Tea
scraped_articles.meta_description: Xiao Yu reportedly rarely drinks plain water. She prefers sweet tea and bubble tea.
scraped_articles.content:
Doctor in Taiwan Removes Over 300 Kidney Stones From Woman Who Always Drinks Bubble Tea

Xiao Yu reportedly rarely drinks plain water. She prefers sweet tea and bubble tea.

Doctor in Taiwan Removes Over 300 Kidney Stones From Woman Who Always Drinks Bubble Tea

A 20-year-old Taiwanese woman recently underwent surgery.

Surprisingly, the doctor removed more than 300 small stones from her right kidney.

The young woman is known as Xiao Yu. According to Taiwanese media, she was hospitalized in Tainan earlier this month.

She felt intense lower back pain and fever. She also had an increased white blood cell in her blood test.

The following CT scan showed that Yu's right kidney was filled with fluid and kidney stones. The medical team started treatment.

From giving antibiotics, draining kidney fluid, and surgery to remove the stones.

During the surgery, doctors removed more than 300 stones in size from 5 mm to 2 cm.

The kidney stones look like "small steamed buns," according to Taiwan News. 

These stones caused a significant health risk.

Xiao Yu reportedly rarely drinks plain water. She prefers sweet tea and bubble tea. It makes the urine concentrated and crystallizes to form stones.

Urologists at Chi Mei Hospital in Tainan highlight the importance of staying hydrated. So the body can process sugar, salt, and calcium.

scraped_articles.content:
55 Random Questions to Ask People in Any Situation to Keep Conversations Going

In a world filled with countless conversations, each presents its unique rhythm and flow. The art of keeping dialogues amusing can sometimes feel like a challenge.

55 Random Questions to Ask People in Any Situation to Keep Conversations Going

Do you find yourself at a social gathering, a business meeting, or a casual chat?

One secret ingredient that can turn a boring exchange into a fantastic conversation. It is the power of random questions.

Random questions have the unique power to beat the limits of small talk. Random questions can also go straight into the depths of conversation. They offer an escape from the ordinary, inviting your chat partner to explore unknown parts of their thoughts.

These random questions are like hidden paths in a labyrinthine garden. This leads you to unexpected blooms of insight and shared laughter.

In this article, we journey through the art of asking random questions. Whether you want to add the energy of wonder to your dialogues or seek the magic of breaking the ice with strangers, our collection of entertaining and random questions will guide you. So, let's look into the charming world of random questions. We will discover how they can turn any situation into a wonderful conversation.

1. How do you like to spend your free time?

2. What do you think the meaning of life is?

3. Do you have any hobbies?

4. What is the most unexpected piece of advice you ever received?

5. If you could ask one question to an all-knowing being, what would it be?

6. What is an ideal that is most worth sacrificing for?

7. What is one concept you cannot understand, no matter how hard you try?

8. If you could ask your future self one question, what would it be?

9. What is one item on your bucket list?

10. What is the most profound experience you have ever had with a stranger?

Random Questions to Ask People

11. What quote most resonates with you?

12. What event changed your perspective on life?

13. If you could tell your past self one thing, what would it be?

14. How do you make the world a better place?

15. What is the most unexpected turn your life took?

16. If you had three wishes, what would you wish for?

17. What’s your favorite tv show?

18. What was your favorite toy growing up?

19. If you could trade lives with someone, who would it be?

20. What’s the most beautiful place you’ve ever seen?

21. If you could interview a famous person, who would you choose?

Random Questions

22. What are your dreams and ambitions?

23. What’s the funniest thing you’ve seen on the news?

24. What are the three scents you like?

25. What’s your favorite sports team?

26. What’s your favorite board game?

27. Which word would you use if you could only use one for the rest of your life?

28. You’ve been given an elephant. you can’t get rid of it. what would you do with it?

29. What is the dumbest way you've been hurt?

30. What sport will be invented next?

31. Have you ever thrown someone an extravagant party?

32. What is the weirdest thing you have ever eaten?

Random Questions

33. Which instrument has the funniest sound?

34. Who’s the messiest person you’ve ever known?

35. What is something that’s true that nobody agrees with you on?

36. What is the greatest risk you have ever taken?

37. What is the most absurd thing you've been tricked into doing or believing?

38. Who is your all-time favorite Disney character?

39. Out of the four seasons, what’s your favorite one?

40. If you could choose any person from history to be your imaginary friend, who would it be and why?

41. What fictional world or place would you like to visit?

42. If you were famous, what would you be famous for?

43. If you could see one movie again for the first time, what would it be and why?

44. As a child, what did you want to be when you grew up?

45. You can only own either a smartphone or a computer, which do you choose?

46. What’s your favorite tradition or holiday?

47. 60s, 70s, 80s, 90s: Which decade do you love the most and why?

48. If you could live in any country, where would you live?

Photo: pexels-mental-health-america-(mha)-

49. What’s your claim to fame?

50. What do you think we owe each other as human beings?


51. What is your most treasured memory?

52. What personal quality do you most want to improve?

Random Questions

53. Whose advice do you value the most?

54. What brings you the most joy?

55. What is the best thing in life?

Photo: pexels-sarah-chai-

Random Questions

We finish our exploration of the art of asking random questions. These will help you keep the conversation going. It's clear that in the symphony of human interaction, these random questions serve as unexpected yet harmonious notes. They will add depth and richness to our dialogues. Remember that the true beauty of random questions lies in the answers they evoke. Also, in the connections, they help us build. They are bridges that lead to deeper understanding, shared laughter, and lifelong friendships.

So, as you venture into the conversations that await you, be armed with random questions.

These will open doors to the stories and experiences of each person. In the end, the beauty of random questions lies in the unpredictability of connections.

We can always find authentic engagement moments by asking, "What's your story?" So, go forth. Let your conversations be like the colors of the human experience are painted, one random question at a time.

55 Happy Father's Day Wishes to Cherish Your Amazing Dad

Happy Father's Day to all the incredible dads out there!
(Photo by Vlada Karpovich, pexels)

55 Happy Father's Day Wishes to Cherish Your Amazing Dad

Father's Day falls on Sunday, June 16, 2024. Father's Day is a special event dedicated to celebrating the amazing dads in our lives.

It's a time to show gratitude for all the love, support, and guidance they give us every day. If you're looking for the perfect way to say thank you and show your appreciation to your dad this Father's Day, you have come to the right place.

Here are 55 happy Father's Day wishes to cherish your incredible dad:












Happy Father's Day Wishes

1. Happy Father's Day to the best dad in the world! Thank you for always being there for me.

2. To my hero, my mentor, and my friend – Happy Father's Day!

scraped_articles.title: A Spooky Tour List of the 5 Most Haunted Places in Salem, MA
scraped_articles.meta_description: Salem, Massachusetts, is known for its rich history, especially during the infamous Salem Witch Trials of 1692.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Most Haunted Places in Salem, Massachusetts,Haunted Places in Salem,Massachusetts,Salem,Haunted,Spooky,United States,America,Horror,ghost,travel,traveler,Destination,timeless,Article,news,paranormal
scraped_articles.content:
A Spooky Tour List of the 5 Most Haunted Places in Salem, MA

Photo: freepik.com

A Spooky Tour List of the 5 Most Haunted Places in Salem, MA

Salem, Massachusetts, is known for its rich history, especially during the infamous Salem Witch Trials of 1692.

But did you know that this quaint New England town is also home to some of the most haunted places in America? If you're a fan of all things spooky and paranormal, visiting these haunted places in Salem should be on your bucket list. Join us on a scary tour of Salem, MA's five most haunted places.



Most Haunted Places in Salem, MA

1. Oregon State Hospital

This historic mental institution is said to be haunted by the spirits of former patients.

The former patients's spirits suffered harsh treatment and neglect. The hospital's dark past includes stories of lobotomies and electroshock therapy, making it a hotspot for paranormal activity.

2. Old Salem Jail

Built in 1813, the Old Salem Jail is infamous for its brutal treatment of inmates and harsh living conditions.

Many prisoners died within its walls. It led to numerous reports of ghostly sightings and unexplained phenomena. Visitors have reported hearing footsteps, whispers, and even feeling cold spots throughout the jail.

While not traditionally associated with hauntings, the Peabody Essex Museum has a long history dating back to 1799.

3. The Peabody Essex Museum

Some visitors have reported experiencing strange happenings, such as objects moving on their own and eerie feelings of being watched. The museum is home to a varied collection of art and artifacts, but it seems that some spirits may also be lingering within its halls.

4. Witch Dungeon Museum

As the name suggests, this museum is dedicated to the history of the Salem Witch Trials.

It present the hysteria that engaged the town in the late 17th century. Visitors to the Witch Dungeon Museum may meet the spirits of those charged with witchcraft and other supernatural phenomena. The museum has interactive exhibits and reenactments of witch trials, providing a chilling insight into Salem's dark past.

Photo: flickr/baalands/Susan S./

5. Burying Point Cemetery

Burying Point Cemetery is said to be haunted by the spirits of those who were accused and executed during the Salem Witch Trials. It is one of Salem's oldest cemeteries. The cemetery dates back to 1637 and is the final resting place of many prominent figures in Salem's history.

Burying Point Cemetery

Visitors have reported seeing apparitions and hearing disembodied voices. Some also feel a sense of unease while wandering among the weathered headstones.

So, if you're feeling brave and looking for a spooky adventure, check out these haunted places in Salem.

Are you a history fan or a thrill-seeker? These sites will send shivers down your spine. Just remember to keep an open mind and respect the spirits that may still be on these hallowed grounds. Happy ghost hunting!


Most Haunted Places in Salem, Massachusetts

This Russian Twitch Streamer Arrested 5 Years For Criticizing Her Country

Anna Bazhutova aka Yokobovich is jailed after broadcasting video that allegedly as an attack by Russian soldier to Ukraine.

As reported by Dexerto, the Twitch streamer was arrested in 2023 after broadcasting an attack done by Russian soldiers to Ukraine.

Now, Anna Bazhutova is threathened by jail punishment for five years after her stream on Twitch a year ago.

Her controversial broadcast caught the attention of many people and receive critics, then it was reported the streamer to police.

Then, the authorities searched her home and placing her under arrest, which left her in detention since August 2023.

The punishment was later given in June 2024 as Bazhutova was found guilty of “spreading false information” about Russia’s military.

Her Twitch channel was also being suspended in March 2023.

scraped_articles.title: The Difference Between Espresso, Ristretto, and Lungo: Coffee Lovers Must Know
scraped_articles.meta_description: For coffee enthusiasts, the terms espresso, ristretto, and lungo are certainly familiar. These three types of coffee are variations of espresso with different flavor profiles.
scraped_articles.content:
The Difference Between Espresso, Ristretto, and Lungo: Coffee Lovers Must Know

Enjoying coffee is a daily routine for many people, especially coffee lovers. Understanding the different types of coffee is important to broaden your knowledge and enjoy coffee in the right way.

The Difference Between Espresso, Ristretto, and Lungo: Coffee Lovers Must Know

For true coffee lovers, the terms espresso, ristretto, and lungo are certainly familiar. These three types of coffee are variations of espresso, each with its own unique characteristics and flavors. Let's explore the differences between them.

Espresso is a type of black coffee made by forcing hot water through very finely ground coffee using a special machine called an espresso machine.

Espresso: The Foundation of Many Coffee Drinks

This process produces coffee with a strong and rich flavor, which is the foundation for various popular coffee drinks like americano, cappuccino, and latte.

Process of Production and Ratios

Espresso is made by brewing coffee for about 30 seconds. A common ratio used is 1:2, which means that 18 grams of dry coffee produces 36 grams of espresso.

With this short extraction time, espresso achieves a balance of bitter, sweet, and sour flavors. A good espresso should not be too sour, bitter, or watery.

Caffeine and Consistency

Espresso has more caffeine than ristretto but slightly less than lungo. Served in a small portion of 30 ml, espresso is a strong and concentrated drink that delivers an intense flavor experience. It is the heart of the coffee experience, giving you an energy boost with every sip.

In Italian, "ristretto" means 'restricted', which refers to a shorter extraction time. Ristretto is made using the same coffee grounds as espresso, but it is extracted with less water and in a quicker time, about 15 seconds.

Ristretto: A Stronger Espresso

Main Differences with Espresso

The typical ratio for a ristretto is 1:1, meaning that 18 grams of dry coffee produces 18 grams of liquid ristretto.

Due to the shorter extraction process, ristretto has a stronger flavor and a thicker texture compared to espresso. However, it contains less caffeine.

Taste and Popularity

Ristretto is known for its sweeter and smoother flavor compared to espresso. Because it has a lighter intensity, many people choose ristretto when they want a coffee experience that is not too strong.

Lungo is a type of black coffee made by using more water and a longer extraction time, usually around 50 to 70 seconds. In Italian, "lungo" means "long," which refers to the longer brewing process.

Lungo: A Longer Extraction

"Ratios and Extraction Process"

The ratio used for making lungo is usually 1:3, meaning that 18 grams of dry coffee produces about 54 grams of lungo.

This longer extraction process results in a drink that is more diluted but contains more caffeine compared to espresso and ristretto.

Characteristics of Flavor

Lungo has a more bitter taste compared to espresso because it is brewed for a longer time, which allows more coffee components to dissolve. This results in a more complex and bitter flavor, making it perfect for those who enjoy coffee with a sharper character.

Even though these three types of drinks are made from the same ingredients, it's important to pay attention to a few factors to achieve the right flavor.

Tips for Making Espresso, Ristretto, and Lungo

1. Extraction Time: The extraction time greatly affects the flavor of coffee. For ristretto, the extraction time is about 15 seconds, for espresso it is 30 seconds, and for lungo it is 50-70 seconds. Properly adjusting the extraction time is key to achieving the best flavor.

2. Amount of Water: The amount of water used varies. Espresso uses a standard amount of water, ristretto uses less water, and lungo uses more water. Pay attention to the amount of water to achieve the desired result for each type of drink.

3. Comparison of Ratios

The right ratios are very important for creating the desired flavor in coffee. Ristretto uses a 1:1 ratio, espresso uses a 1:2 ratio, and lungo uses a 1:3 ratio. Having the correct ratio ensures that every drop of coffee has a balanced taste.

Understanding the Differences Between Espresso, Ristretto, and Lungo for a Better Coffee Experience

These three types of coffee not only offer different flavors but also provide unique experiences when enjoying black coffee. Coffee is an art, and by understanding its various kinds, we can appreciate every sip even more.

So, are you ready to try all three and find your favorite?

scraped_articles.title: 50 Inspirational George Washington Quotes About Leadership, Peace, And Freedom
scraped_articles.meta_description: These wise and powerful George Washington quotes will inspire you to be our best selves, to strive for greatness, and to always stay true to our values.
scraped_articles.content:
50 Inspirational George Washington Quotes About Leadership, Peace, And Freedom

George Washington was the first President of the United States. He was known not only for his leadership but also for his wise and inspirational words. Many people look to George Washington quotes for guidance and motivation in their own lives. His words continue to resonate with people of all ages, even today.

50 Inspirational George Washington Quotes About Leadership, Peace, And Freedom

Inspirational George Washington quotes have the power to uplift and inspire us to be our best selves, to strive for greatness, and to always stay true to our values. His quotes have a timeless quality that transcends generations. His words have the ability to make us think, reflect, and take action in our own lives.

In this article, we will explore some of the most powerful and impactful George Washington quotes that have left a lasting impression on people around the world. We collected these quotes from various sources, Monday (18/12/2023).

A. George Washington Quotes About Liberty And Freedom

1. "Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth."

2. "The time is near at hand which must determine whether Americans are to be free men or slaves."

3. "Your love of liberty, your respect for the laws, your habits of industry, and your practice of the moral and religious obligations, are the strongest claims to national and individual happiness."

4. "What a triumph for the advocates of despotism to find that we are incapable of governing ourselves, and that systems founded on the basis of equal liberty are merely ideal and fallacious."

5. "I can only say that there is not a man living who wishes more sincerely than I do to see a plan adopted for the abolition of slavery."

6. "Interwoven as is the love of liberty with every ligament of your hearts, no recommendation of mine is necessary to fortify or confirm the attachment."

7. "Not only do I pray for it, on the score of human dignity, but I can clearly forsee that nothing but the rooting out of slavery can perpetuate the existence of our union, by consolidating it in a common bond of principle."

Liberty And Freedom

8. "I am principled against this kind of traffic in the human species and to disperse the families I have an aversion."

9. "I wish from my soul that the legislature of this State could see the policy of a gradual Abolition of Slavery."

10. "If we mean to support the liberty and independence which has cost us so much blood and treasure to establish, we must drive far away the demon of party spirit and local reproach."

B. George Washington Quotes On War And Peace

1. "If we desire to avoid insult, we must be able to repel it; if we desire to secure peace, one of the most powerful instruments of our rising prosperity, it must be known, that we are at all times ready for War."

2. "The constitution vests the power of declaring war in Congress; therefore no offensive expedition of importance can be undertaken until after they shall have deliberated upon the subject and authorized such a measure."

3. "Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all."

4. "The willingness with which our young people are likely to serve in any war, no matter how justified, shall be directly proportional to how they perceive the Veterans of earlier wars were treated and appreciated by their nation."

5. "There is nothing so likely to produce peace as to be well prepared to meet the enemy."

6. "To be prepared for war is one of the most effective means of preserving peace." - George Washington

7. "There is nothing so likely to produce peace as to be well prepared to meet the enemy."

War and Peace

8. "Over grown military establishments are under any form of government inauspicious to liberty, and are to be regarded as particularly hostile to republican liberty."

9. "Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all."

10. "Peace with all the world is my sincere wish. I am sure it is our true policy, and am persuaded it is the ardent desire of the government."

C. George Washington Quotes About Leadership

1. "Few men have virtue to withstand the highest bidder."

2. "A people unused to restraint must be led, they will not be drove."

3. "It is infinitely better to have a few good Men, than many indifferent ones."

4. "Remember that it is the actions, and not the commission, that make the officer, and that there is more expected from him, than the title."

5. "Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company."

Leadership

6. "A pack of jackasses led by a lion is superior to a pack of lions led by a jackass."

7. "Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all."

8. "Leadership is not only having a vision, but also having the courage, the discipline, and the resources to get you there."

9. "Require nothing unreasonable of your officers and men, but see that whatever is required be punctually complied with. Reward and punish every man according to his merit, without partiality or prejudice; hear his complaints; if well founded, redress them; if otherwise, discourage them, in order to prevent frivolous ones. Discourage vice in every shape, and impress upon the mind of every man, from the first to the lowest, the importance of the cause, and what it is they are contending for."

10. "A man's intentions should be allowed in some respects to plead for his actions."

D. Inspirational George Washington Quotes

1. "99% of failures come from people who make excuses."

2. "It is better to offer no excuse than a bad one."

3. "When there is no vision, there is no hope."

4. "Occupants of public offices love power and are prone to abuse it."

5. "Make sure you are doing what God wants you to do--then do it with all your strength."

6. "Truth will ultimately prevail where there is pains taken to bring it to light."

7. "We can not guarantee success, we can strive to deserve it."

8. "You have only one way to convince others, listen to them."

9. "Happiness depends more upon the internal frame of a person's own mind, than on the externals in the world."

10. "Worry is the interest paid by those who borrow trouble."

11. "Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism."

12. "The whole duty of man is summed up in obedience to God's will."

13. "There is no practice more dangerous than that of borrowing money."

14. "Perseverance and spirit have done wonders in all ages."

15. "Have the strength to be an honest person."

16. "Example, whether it be good or bad, has a powerful influence."

17. "Great people are not affected by each puff of wind that blows ill. Like great ships, they sail serenely on, in a calm sea or a great tempest."

18. "If we are wise, let us prepare for the worst."

19. "To please everybody is impossible; were I to undertake it, I should probably please nobody."

20. "Give not advice without being asked, and when desired, do it briefly."

scraped_articles.title: The Famous Mirror Mirror on the Wall Quote: Origins and Variations

scraped_articles.content:
The Famous Mirror Mirror on the Wall Quote: Origins and Variations

The famous “Mirror mirror on the wall” quote is known worldwide. It comes from the story of Snow White. This article will explore its origins, variations, and impact on popular culture.

Origins of the Quote

1. The quote comes from the Brothers Grimm fairy tale “Snow White”

2. In German, it’s “Spieglein, Spieglein an der Wand”

3. The Evil Queen asks this question to her magic mirror

4. She wants to know who is the most beautiful in the land

5. The mirror always tells the truth

Disney’s Version

6. Disney’s 1937 animated film changed the quote slightly

7. In the movie, the Evil Queen says “Magic mirror on the wall”

8. This change has caused confusion for many people

9. Some think it’s always been “Mirror mirror”

10. Others believe it’s always been “Magic mirror”

Popular Misquotes

11. Many people remember “Mirror mirror on the wall”

12. This version is more common in other tellings of Snow White

13. It’s also used in many books and adaptations

14. The misquote has become more famous than the original

15. This is an example of the Mandela Effect

The Mandela Effect

16. The Mandela Effect is when many people share a false memory

17. It’s named after Nelson Mandela

18. Many people thought he died in prison in the 1980s

19. But he actually died in 2013

20. The “Mirror mirror” quote is a common Mandela Effect example

Cultural Impact

21. The quote has become a part of popular culture

22. It’s often used in jokes and memes

23. Many products use the quote for marketing

24. It appears in other movies and TV shows

25. The quote is recognized even by those who haven’t seen Snow White

Variations of the Quote

26. “Mirror mirror on the wall, who’s the fairest of them all?”

27. “Magic mirror on the wall, who is the fairest one of all?”

28. “Mirror mirror on the wall, show me the truth…”

29. “Mirror mirror on the wall, you are the fairest of them all”

30. “Mirror mirror on the wall, who’s the baddest of them all?”

Use in Other Stories

31. The quote has inspired other stories and books

32. “Mirror Mirror” by Gregory Maguire retells Snow White

35. Other authors have used similar mirror concepts in their work

In Religion and Spirituality

Conclusion

The “Mirror mirror on the wall” quote has become a significant part of our culture. It appears in many forms and is used in various contexts. The quote’s popularity shows how fairy tales continue to influence our modern world. Whether it’s “Mirror mirror” or “Magic mirror,” the quote’s message about beauty, truth, and self-reflection remains powerful and relevant today.

scraped_articles.content:
How to Ask Gender Questions in Surveys: A Comprehensive Guide

Asking about gender in surveys has changed a lot in recent years. It’s important to ask in a way that includes everyone and gets accurate information. This guide will help you create good gender questions for your surveys.

Why Gender Questions Matter

Gender is an important piece of information in many surveys. It can show differences in how people think and what they experience. But the old way of just asking “male or female” leaves out some people. Many people don’t fit into just those two options.

Good gender questions help:

• Make everyone feel included and respected

• Get more accurate data about gender

• Understand different gender experiences

• Follow best practices in research

Surveys need to keep up with how people see gender today. This means offering more options beyond just male and female.

The Problem with Binary Gender Options

For a long time, most surveys only asked if someone was male or female. This is called a “binary” question because it only has two choices. But this approach has some big problems:

• It leaves out people who don’t identify as male or female

• It doesn’t capture the full range of gender identities

• It can make some people feel excluded or disrespected

• It doesn’t give accurate data about gender diversity

As our understanding of gender has grown, we need better ways to ask about it. Many surveys are now adding more options to be more inclusive.

Key Terms to Understand

When talking about gender in surveys, it helps to know some important terms:

• Sex: The biological traits a person is born with, like chromosomes and body parts

• Gender identity: How a person sees themselves in terms of gender

• Gender expression: How a person shows their gender to others through things like clothes and behavior

• Transgender: When someone’s gender identity is different from the sex they were assigned at birth

• Non-binary: Gender identities that are not strictly male or female

• Cisgender: When someone’s gender identity matches the sex they were assigned at birth

Understanding these terms can help you create better gender questions that respect different identities.

Best Practices for Asking About Gender

Here are some important tips for asking about gender in surveys:

• Use “gender” instead of “sex” unless you specifically need biological information

• Offer more than just male and female options

• Include a way for people to describe their gender in their own words

• Make answering optional if possible

• Explain why you’re asking and how the information will be used

• Keep the question separate from ones about sexual orientation

• Use respectful, inclusive language

• Test your questions to make sure they work well

Following these practices will help you create gender questions that are inclusive and get good data.

Sample Gender Questions

Here are some examples of how to ask about gender in surveys:

Basic inclusive question:

What is your gender?

• Man

• Woman

• Non-binary

• Prefer to self-describe: _______

• Prefer not to say

Two-step question (for more detailed data):

1. What sex were you assigned at birth?

• Female

• Male

• Intersex

• Prefer not to say

2. What is your current gender identity?

• Woman

• Man

• Non-binary

• Transgender

• Prefer to self-describe: _______

• Prefer not to say

Open-ended question:

How would you describe your gender identity? _______

Choose the type of question that best fits your survey needs and audience.

Considerations for Different Survey Types

The best way to ask about gender can depend on the type of survey you’re doing:

General public surveys:

• Use simple language everyone can understand

• Offer a few common options plus a way to self-describe

• Make sure options work for different cultures if surveying internationally

LGBTQ+ community surveys:

• Offer more detailed options for gender identities

• Include questions about both gender identity and expression

• Consider asking about pronouns

Medical surveys:

• Ask about both gender identity and sex assigned at birth

• Explain why this information is needed for health reasons

• Be sensitive to privacy concerns

Workplace surveys:

• Focus on gender identity rather than biological sex

• Ensure confidentiality of responses

• Explain how data will be used to support diversity efforts

Always think about your audience and goals when designing gender questions.

Challenges in Asking About Gender

Creating good gender questions can be tricky. Here are some common challenges:

• Balancing inclusivity and simplicity: You want to include everyone, but too many options can be confusing

• Keeping up with changing language: Terms for gender identities change over time

• Cultural differences: Gender concepts vary around the world

• Privacy concerns: Some people may not want to share their gender identity

• Data analysis: More options can make it harder to analyze results

• Resistance to change: Some people may not like new ways of asking about gender

Being aware of these challenges can help you create better questions and handle any issues that come up.

Tips for Analyzing Gender Data

Once you’ve collected gender data, here’s how to analyze it well:

• Decide how to group responses for analysis

• Consider combining small groups to protect privacy

• Look for patterns across different gender identities

• Be careful about making assumptions from small sample sizes

• Use inclusive language when reporting results

• Explain your methods clearly

• Highlight any limitations in your data

Good analysis helps you get useful insights from your gender data while respecting everyone’s identities.

Legal and Ethical Considerations

When asking about gender, keep these important points in mind:

• Follow any laws about collecting personal data

• Get informed consent from participants

• Protect people’s privacy and confidentiality

• Be clear about how data will be used and stored

• Allow people to skip the question if they want

• Consider any risks to participants, especially in places where being transgender or non-binary might not be safe

• Use the data responsibly and ethically

Always put the well-being and rights of your survey participants first.

The Future of Gender Questions in Surveys

Gender questions in surveys are likely to keep changing. Here are some trends to watch:

• More surveys offering non-binary options

• Growing use of open-ended gender questions

• Better ways to ask about gender in different cultures

• New technologies for collecting gender data

• More focus on gender expression, not just identity

• Changes in how official records and IDs handle gender

Staying up-to-date on these trends will help you create surveys that respect all gender identities and get accurate data.

Resources for Further Learning

Want to learn more about gender questions in surveys? Check out these resources:

• GLAAD Media Reference Guide

• The GenIUSS Group: Best Practices for Asking Questions to Identify Transgender and Other Gender Minority Respondents on Population-Based Surveys

• Human Rights Campaign: LGBTQ+ Self-Identification in the Workplace

• World Health Organization: Gender and Health

• American Psychological Association: Definitions Related to Sexual Orientation and Gender Diversity

These sources can give you more detailed information and guidance on creating inclusive gender questions.

Conclusion

Asking about gender in surveys is important, but it needs to be done carefully and respectfully. Good gender questions help everyone feel included and give researchers better data. By following best practices, considering different needs, and staying up-to-date, you can create gender questions that work well for all your survey participants. Remember that how we talk about gender is always changing, so be ready to update your approach over time. With thoughtful design and analysis, your gender questions can contribute to a better understanding of gender diversity in society.

scraped_articles.title: 7 Fun Facts About Cricket Sport
scraped_articles.meta_description: 7 Fun Facts About Cricket Sport; from unlucky number to youngest player ever!
scraped_articles.content:
7 Fun Facts About Cricket Sport

7 Fun Facts About Cricket Sport

Cricket is a big deal in India and around the world. If we split the world into two, cricket fans would make up a huge part. Here are some interesting and easy-to-understand facts for all the cricket lovers out there:

Swipe Up to Learn More!

The First Cricket Ball

Cricket might've started with shepherds, and the first cricket balls were made of wool, not like today's hard ones. The first official organized cricket matches began in 1877, long after the game's early days.

Longest Cricket Match

Picture a cricket match lasting 14 days! It happened in 1939, during England vs. South Africa. The game ended in a draw as the English team had to leave for their ship. This epic match holds the record for the longest cricket game.

Youngest Professional Cricket Player

Brian Close made history as England's youngest cricket player at 17. That was over a hundred years ago. To compare, Wilfred Rhodes played until he was 51—quite a difference!

Cricket can be Dangerous

While cricket is usually safe, some tragic incidents have occurred. In 1624, England player Jasper Vinall became the first cricketer to lose his life. Much later, in 1989, British player Wilf Slack tragically passed away during a game.

The Only Team to Play Over 1000 Test Matches

England's cricket team has played over 1000 tests. This happened during a 2018 Test against India in Edgbaston, showcasing England's long cricket history.

111 is Considered Unlucky Number

Scoring 111 runs might seem good, but in cricket superstition, it's seen as unlucky. Some think it brings bad luck because the number looks like a cricket wicket. It's a quirky superstition in the game.

It is the World's Second Most Popular Sport

Cricket started in the 16th century and is now enjoyed in over 180 countries. About 2.5 billion people are cricket fans or players, making it the second most loved sport globally.

scraped_articles.title: Michael J Fox Sits in a Wheelchair and Accompanies Coldplay to Play Guitar in Fix You
scraped_articles.meta_description: Coldplay fans were surprised by Michael's presence.
scraped_articles.content:
Michael J Fox Sits in a Wheelchair and Accompanies Coldplay to Play Guitar in Fix You

Michael J Fox Sits in a Wheelchair and Accompanies Coldplay to Play Guitar in Fix You

The band Coldplay performed something special at the 2024 Glastonbury Festival with actor Michael J Fox on stage.

Coldplay fans were surprised by Michael's presence.

Michael, who was using a wheelchair, was present on stage while playing the guitar for Coldplay's hit song "Fix You".

Coldplay, hosted by the vocalist Chris Martin, warmly welcomed Michael's presence.

"With his Chuck Berry riff and the way he punched Biff: ladies and gentlemen, please welcome Michael J. Fox," Chris Martin shouted from the stage.

Fox himself has been known to have had Parkinson's disease since 1991.

Chris Martin and other Coldplay personnel approached Fox during the song and played next to him.

Meanwhile, Chris Martin seemed to be kneeling next to Fox.

After the song, Martin specifically expressed his pride in Michael J Fox, whom he called a 'hero'.

"Thank you for the main reason we're in the band, for watching Back to the Future. So thank you to our hero forever and one of the most amazing people on earth, Mr. Michael J. Fox. Thank you, Michael," Martin said.

Fox then smiled and waved and was escorted backstage.

scraped_articles.title: 70 Pokémon Jokes That Will Catch Your Laugh
scraped_articles.meta_description: Are you a big Pokémon fan? These funny Pokémon  jokes will surely send you rolling on the floor.
scraped_articles.content:
70 Pokémon Jokes That Will Catch Your Laugh

Pokémon is one of the most popular franchises in the world. From video games to trading cards and TV shows, millions of people love its exciting battles and adorable creatures. Whether you are a long-time fan or just starting your journey, Pokémon brings fun and adventure to all ages. But did you know that there are also many funny Pokémon jokes to enjoy?

Pokémon jokes are a great way to bring laughter to fans. These jokes often use clever wordplay and references to famous characters like Pikachu, Charizard, and Jigglypuff. They are perfect for sharing with friends, family, or anyone who loves Pokémon. If you enjoy humor and Pokémon, you will love these funny and creative jokes.

In this article, we will explore some of the best Pokémon jokes that will make you smile. We gathered these funny jokes from various sources, Saturday (29/3/2025). From classic puns to witty one-liners, there is something for everyone.

The Best Pokémon Jokes

1. Why did the trainer bring a ladder to the Pokémon gym? He heard the competition was going to be fierce.

2. I tried to teach my Blastoise to play the trumpet, but he just kept blowing bubbles.

3. What do you call a storm of Pokémon? A Pokémonsoon!

4. Why did the Miltank cross the road? To get to the udder side.

5. What's a Pokémon's favorite subject in school? History, because it's full of legendary tales.

6. What appears over Ash's head when he gets an idea? A LightBulbasaur!

7. Why did the trainer get lost in the forest? He couldn't see past all the Treecko-ing branches.

8. I asked my dad why a grown man would play Pokémon Go? He said "Wynaut."

9. What did one Geodude say to the other Geodude? Let's rock!

10. What type of Pokémon are Jimi Hendrix, Janis Joplin and Elvis? Legendary Pokémon.

11. What is a Pokémon fan's favorite place to go in France? Paras!

12. Why was Hypno so energetic? He wasn't Drowzee anymore.

13. Which Pokémon could also be a pirate? Arrrrrr-bok.

14. What do you call a Pokémon who can't move very fast? A Slow-poke.

15. Which Pokémon do soccer players like the most? GOALduck.

16. Which college do Pokémon go to? StarU.

17. What do you tell a stressed-out Pokémon? "Kakuna Rattata!"

18. What is Aladdin's favourite pokémon? Magikarpet!

19. What's the name of the Pokémon that traveled with Dorothy to Oz? Totodile.

20. What do you call a low fat Pokémon? Butterfree.

Funny Pikachu Jokes

1. Why did Pikachu get a job at the power plant? Because he was great at conducting himself.

2. How do you get Pikachu on a bus? Poke him on.

3. Why can't you blindfold a Pokémon? Because it's going to Pikachu!

4. What's Pikachu's favorite song? The Hokey Pokémon.

5. What happens when Pikachu holds his breath? He goes Pika-blue!

6. How can Pikachu make a baby laugh? By playing pika-boo!

7. What do you call a Pikachu that can fix computers? Geek-achu.

8. What do you call a Pikachu that's a good detective? A shocking investigator.

9. Why did the Pikachu cross the playground? To get to the other slide and *charge* up some fun.

10. Why did Pikachu get a ticket? It was speeding and didn't have its license, it was a shocker.

11. I saw a Pikachu trying to fix a lightbulb, but it kept short-circuiting the system.

12. My Pikachu is always in a good mood, he's just a very positive charge.

13. Why did the Pikachu get a promotion? Because he was current-ly the best employee.

14. What do you call a group of Pikachu playing music? An electrifying band.

15. What would you call a green Pikachu? Pickle-chu.

The Best One-Liners Pokémon Jokes

1. Are you a Hitmonlee? Because your body is kickin'.

2. You must be a Charmander. Because you're making me hot.

3. Baby, I'm A Mismagius. I'll make all of your wildest dreams come true.

4. You remind me of Deoxys. You're out of this world.

5. Are you a Flareon? Because you're a sexy fox.

6. What does Ash say when he wants to date someone? I choose you.

7. Don't be a Gloom, try to be a little more Vileplume.

8. I overheard someone telling Pokémon jokes, but I couldn't catch 'em all.

9. The Pokémon was finding counting really hard, he couldn't get past pikaTWO.

10. My Pikachu misses me a lot, but her aim is getting better.

11. Roses are red, violets are blue. If you were a Pokémon, I'd choose you.

12. My love for you burns like a Charizard's tail.

13. If you were in a Pokémon Contest, you'd win first place in the Beauty/Cuteness category.

14. Like an Umbreon, I also evolve at night.

15. I'm sorry about these bad puns. I should've kept my big meowth shut.

More Funny Pokémon Jokes

1. I tried to train a Snorlax to be a marathon runner, but he kept taking power naps. It was a real snooze fest.

2. A Jigglypuff walked into a bar, ordered a drink, and started singing. It was a real crowd pleaser, or at least it would have been if everyone hadn't fallen asleep.

3. Why did the trainer get a ticket for speeding on his bike? He was going a little too-fast-tly.

4. My friend tried to breed a Magikarp with a Gyarados, but it was just a splash of disappointment.

5. A Voltorb walked into a bar, the bartender said, "Hey, you're gonna blow this place up."

6. I tried to make a smoothie with a Tangela, but it was a bit too knotty to blend properly.

7. What do you call a group of psychic Pokémon having a meeting? A mind meld.

8. I asked my Ghastly if it wanted to go out for ice cream, but it said it was too cold.

9. What's a Pokémon's favorite type of comedy? Stand-up, because they're always battling on stage.

10. I told my friend a joke about a Pidgey, but it just flew over his head.

11. Why was the trainer so bad at bowling? He kept throwing Poké Balls.

12. I tried to teach my Magikarp to fly. Turns out, that was a splash-landing disaster.

13. What do you do when your Loudred evolves? Buy more earplugs!

14. What did the judge say when a Skuntank came into the court? Odor in the court!

15. How do dragon-type Pokémon solve their disputes? They let bagons be bagons.

16. Why are ghost Pokémon so bad at lying? Because you can see right through them.

17. I asked a Ditto how it was doing, it said it was feeling very…me-too.

18. Why did the trainer bring a map to the Pokémon Center? He heard the service was all over the place.

19. What's better than one Pikachu? PikaTWO!

20. What kind of car does Pikachu drive? A volts-wagon.

scraped_articles.content:
5 Creepy Facts About SpongeBob SquarePants That Will Blow Your Mind

5 Creepy Facts About SpongeBob SquarePants That Will Blow Your Mind

SpongeBob SquarePants is the beloved animated series. It has entertained audiences for decades. SpongeBob has all the fun and games.

Beneath its rich, unique exterior lie some rather creepy and dark facts that may change how you see Bikini Bottom's most famous residents. It ranges from characters exhibiting psychological disorders to dark backstories and hidden figurative themes. This article explores five creepy facts about SpongeBob SquarePants that will blow your mind.

Creepy Facts About SpongeBob SquarePants

One of the most unique and, at the same time, weird characters in Bikini Bottom is Patrick Star. Many fans have speculated that Patrick may have Antisocial Personality Disorder (ASPD). Some of his symptoms characterize this disorder.

1. Patrick Has Antisocial Personality Disorder

Patrick has a "failure to conform to societal norms with lawful behavior," "impulsivity and failure to plan," and "reckless disregard for the safety of self and others."

Looking at Patrick's actions throughout the series, you can find examples that align with these symptoms.

Creepy Facts About SpongeBob SquarePants

Whether it's his careless behavior, concern for others' feelings, or his liking for making impulsive decisions. Patrick's character takes on a new, darker layer when viewed through the lens of ASPD.

The mystery surrounding Pearl, Mr. Krab's daughter. Her true parents have long been a topic of discussion among fans. Some theories suggest that Mr. Krabs might have adopted Pearl after her biological parents met a tragic end in a whaling incident.

2. Mr. Krabs Adopted Pearl After Her Parents Were Killed

This theory gains drag due to the stark differences between Mr. Krabs and Pearl, both physically and behaviorally. The idea of Mr. Krabs stepping in as her godfather and adopting her after a bad event gives a dark, sad backdrop to Pearl's character.

Reddit user Cucumber_d raised a creepy theory that links the main characters of SpongeBob SquarePants. There are seven deadly sins, a concept rooted in Christian theology.

3. The Main Characters Represent the 7 Deadly Sins

According to this theory, each character symbolizes a specific sin: Greed (Mr. Krabs), Envy (Plankton), Sloth (Gary), Pride (Sandy), Wrath (Squidward), Gluttony (Patrick), and Lust (SpongeBob). This symbolic performance suggests that the characters are more than quirky sea animals. They also mean that the show carries deeper moral undertones.

The episode "Money Talks" from season 5 reveals that Mr. Krabs sold his soul to the Flying Dutchman. He sold it in exchange for the power to talk to money.

4. Mr. Krabs Sold His Soul Multiple Times

What's truly worrisome is that the episode indicates this wasn't a one-time deal; Mr. Krabs had already sold his soul eight times. It is likely in exchange for supernatural abilities or material wealth. This creepy acknowledgment increases questions about the depths of Mr. Krabs. He is willing to go for profit and power, which brings him in a much darker light.

An incredibly creepy theory suggests that the residents of Bikini Bottom, including the cameo character. The residents suffer from various mental illnesses or disorders.

5. Every Character in SpongeBob Has a Mental Illness

For example, Patrick's irregular behavior could indicate "multiple personality disorder." Then, Mrs. Puff's constant car crashes might point to "Post Traumatic Stress Disorder." This theory adds a layer of psychological complexity to the show. They remind us that there could be more analysis of the human condition beneath humor and silliness.

SpongeBob SquarePants may be a lighthearted and entertaining show on the surface. These creepy facts tell a much more complex and nuanced world within Bikini Bottom. This beloved series has hidden depths that will flash discussions and theories for years. The next time you watch an episode of SpongeBob, remember there's more to it than meets the eye. They creep just under the cheerful face of the pineapple in the sea.
